scripts.build:
rsync -av  --exclude='*.caf' ./source/ ./build/
caf -m -c source -o build
npm run nn
scripts.build-clean:
# BUILD CLEAN START
#   - building into: build-temp
#
rm -rf ./__build-old__
rsync -av  --exclude='*.caf' ./source/ ./build-temp/
caf -m -c source -o build-temp
npm run nn

nn build-temp/*

# BUILD CLEAN FINIALIZING
#  - replace old build in:   build
#  - with new build from:    build-temp
#
mv build __build-old__
mv build-temp build
rm -rf ./__build-old__
scripts.start-dev:
cleanup() {
  echo "Stopping Docker container..."
  npm run dynamodb-stop
  echo "Container stopped."
}
trap cleanup SIGINT SIGTERM

npm run dynamodb-start
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
    echo "Failed to start Docker container. Exiting..."
    exit 1
fi

# wait for the first build so dynamodb has a chance to start
npm run build
sleep 1

# uncomment for real app development
# art-ery-cli initialize-pipelines

# rebuild on changes
npm run build-watch&

# dynamodb-admin is a web UI for DynamoDB
npm run dynamodb-admin&
nodemon ./server&

sleep 5
echo "DynamoDb:       http://localhost:8081"
echo "DynamoDb admin: http://localhost:8001"
echo "App Server:     http://localhost:3000"
wait
